anya-e0801n6:1_1: Vattamāne ti anti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mhe.
anya-e0801n6:2_0: Vattamāne āraddhāparisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā tyādayo honti. Gacchati, gacchanti, gacchasi gacchatha, gacchāmi gacchāma, gacchate gacchante, gacchase gacchavhe, gacche gacchāmhe.
anya-e0801n6:2_3: purepurāsaddehi vā anāgatattāvagame tadā tassa vattamānattā, kālabyattayo vā eso,
anya-e0801n6:2_4: bhavanteva hi kālantarepi tyādayo bāhulakā ‘santesu parigūhāmi,
anya-e0801n6:2_5: mā ca kiñca ito adaṁ’ ‘kāyassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṁ,
anya-e0801n6:3_1: Bhavissati ssati ssanti ssasi ssatha ssāmi ssāma ssate ssante ssase ssavhe ssaṁ ssāmhe.
anya-e0801n6:4_0: Bhavissati anāraddhe atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ssatyādayo honti. Gamissati gamissanti, gamissasi gamissatha, gamissāmi gamissāma, gamissate gamissante, gamissase gamissavhe, gamissaṁ gamissāmhe.
anya-e0801n6:6_0: Nāmasadde nipāte sati garahāyaṁ vimhaye ca gamyamāne ssatyādayo honti.
anya-e0801n6:6_2: na hi nāma bhikkhave tassa moghapurisassa pāṇesu anuddayā bhavissati,
anya-e0801n6:6_3: kathaṁ hi nāma so bhikkhave moghapuriso sabbamattikāmayaṁ kuṭikaṁ karissati?
anya-e0801n6:6_4: Tattha nāma tvaṁ moghapurisa mayā virāgāya dhamme desite sarāgāya cetessasi?
anya-e0801n6:6_5: Atthi nāma tāta sudinna ābhidosikaṁ kummāsaṁ paribhuñjissasi, atthiyevihāpi nindāvagamo.
anya-e0801n6:6_6: Vimuye-acchariyaṁ vata bho abbhutaṁ vata bho santena vata bho pabbajitā vihārena viharanti,
anya-e0801n6:6_7: yatra hi nāma saññī samāno jāgaro pañcamattāni sakaṭasatāni nissāya nissāya abhikkantāni neva dakkhati na pana saddaṁ sossati,
anya-e0801n6:6_8: acchariyaṁ andho nāma pabbatamārohissati, badhiro nāma saddaṁ sossati.
anya-e0801n6:7_0: 4. Bhūte īuṁ ottha iṁ mhā ā ū se vhaṁ a mhe.
anya-e0801n6:8_0: Bhūte parisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ī ādayo honti. Agamī agamuṁ, agamo agamittha, agamiṁ agamimhā , agamā agamū, agamise agamivhaṁ, agama agamimhe.
anya-e0801n6:9_1: Anajjatane ā ū o ttha a mhā ttha tthuṁ se vhaṁ iṁ mhase.
anya-e0801n6:10_0: Avijjamānajjatane bhūte-tthe vattamānato kriyatthā āādayo honti.
anya-e0801n6:11_0: Āñāyyā ca uṭṭhānā, āñāyyā ca saṁvesanā;
anya-e0801n6:13_0: Agamā agamū, agamo, agamattha, agama agamamhā, agamattha agamatthuṁ, agamase agamavhaṁ, agamiṁ agamamhase. Aññapadattho kiṁ? Ajja hiyyo vā agamāsi.
anya-e0801n6:14_1: Parokkhe a u e ttha a mha ttha re ttho vho i mhe.
anya-e0801n6:15_0: Apaccakkhe bhūtānajjatane-tthe vuttamānato kriyātthā a ādayo honti. Jagāma jagamu, jagame jagapittha, jagama jagamimha, jagamittha jagamire, jagamittho jagamivho, jagami jagamimhe.
anya-e0801n6:15_1: Mūḷhavikkhittabyāsattacittena attanāpi kriyākatābhinibbattitakāle-nupaladdhā samānā phalenā-numīyamānā parokkhāva vatthuto,
anya-e0801n6:16_1: Eyyādo vātipattiyaṁ ssā ssaṁ su sse ssatha ssaṁ ssāmhā ssatha ssiṁsu sasse ssavhe ssiṁ ssāmhase.
anya-e0801n6:17_0: Eyyādo visaye kriyātipattiyaṁ ssādayo honti vibhāsā.
anya-e0801n6:17_2: ete ca ssādayo sāmatthiyātītānāgatesveva honti na vattamāne tatra… kriyātipatyasambhavā,
anya-e0801n6:17_3: sace paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṁ alabhissā arahā abhavissā,
anya-e0801n6:17_4: dakkhiṇena ce agamissā na sakaṭaṁ pariyā bhavissā, dakkhiṇena ce agamissaṁsu, agamisse agamissatha, agamissaṁ agamissāmhā, agamissatha agamissiṁsu, agamissase agamissavhe, agamissiṁ agamissāmhase, na sakaṭaṁ pariyābhavissā, vātikiṁ?
anya-e0801n6:17_5: Dakkhiṇe na ce gamissati na sakaṭaṁ pariyā bhavissati.
anya-e0801n6:18_1: Hetuphalesveyya eyyuṁ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṁ etho eyyavho eyyaṁ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0801n6:19_0: Hetubhūtāyaṁ elabhūtāyañca kriyāyaṁ vattamānato kriyatthā eyyādayo vā honti,
anya-e0801n6:19_1: sace saṅkhārā niccā bhaveyyuṁ na nirujjheyyuṁ,
anya-e0801n6:19_2: dakkhiṇena ce gaccheyya na sakaṭaṁ pariyābhaveyya, dakkhiṇena ce gaccheyyuṁ, gaccheyyāsi gaccheyyātha, gaccheyyāmi gaccheyyāma, gacchetha gaccheraṁ, gacchetho gaccheyyavho, gaccheyyaṁ gaccheyyāmhe, na sakaṭaṁ pariyyābhaveyya, bhavanaṁ gamanaṁ ca hetu,
anya-e0801n6:19_4: iha kasmā na hoti ‘hantīhi palāyati, vassatīti dhāvati, hanissatīti palāyissatī’ti?
anya-e0801n6:19_5: Iti saddeneva hetuhetumantatāya jotitattā, vāti kiṁ?
anya-e0801n6:19_6: Dakkhiṇena ce gamissati na sakaṭaṁ pariyābhavissati.
anya-e0801n6:21_0: Pañho=sampucchanaṁ sampadhāraṇaṁ nirūpaṇaṁ kāriyānicchayanaṁ patthanā=yācanaṁ iṭṭhāsiṁ bhanañca,
anya-e0801n6:21_2: sā ca duvidhāva sādarānādaravasena… visayabhedena bhinnāyapi tadubhayānativattanato,
anya-e0801n6:21_4: pañhe - kimāyasmā vinayaṁ pariyāpuṇeyya? Udāhu dhammaṁ,
anya-e0801n6:21_5: gaccheyyaṁ vāhaṁ uposathaṁ na vā gaccheyyaṁ,
anya-e0801n6:21_6: patthanāyaṁ-labheyyā-haṁ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ labheyyaṁ upasampadaṁ,
anya-e0801n6:21_8: vidhimhi-bhavaṁ pattaṁ paceyya, bhavaṁ puññaṁ kareyya, iha bhavaṁ bhuñjeyya, iha bhavaṁ nisīdeyya, māṇavakaṁ bhavaṁ ajjhāpeyya,
anya-e0801n6:21_9: anuññāpattakālesupi siddhāva… tatthāpi vidhippatītito, anuññāyaṁ-evaṁ kareyyāsi, pattakāle-kaṭaṁ kareyyāsi, patto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe,
anya-e0801n6:21_10: yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ saṅgho uposathaṁ kareyya,
anya-e0801n6:21_11: etassa bhagavā kālo etassa sugata kālo yaṁ bhagavā sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññapeyya,
anya-e0801n6:22_1: Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṁ antaṁ ssu vho e āmase.
anya-e0801n6:23_0: Pañhādīsvete honti kriyatthato. Gacchatu gacchantu, gacchāhi gacchatha, gacchāmi gacchāma, gacchataṁ gacchantaṁ, gacchassu gacchavho, gacche, gacchāmase,
anya-e0801n6:23_1: pañhe-kinnu khalu bho byākaraṇamadhīyassu, patthanāyaṁ-dadāhi me, jīvatu bhavaṁ,
anya-e0801n6:23_2: vidhimhi-kaṭaṁ karotu bhavaṁ, puññaṁ karotu bhavaṁ, iha bhavaṁ bhuñjatu, iha bhavaṁ nisīdatu,
anya-e0801n6:23_3: uddisatu bhante bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkhaṁ, pesane-gaccha bhaṇe gāmaṁ, anumatiyaṁ - evaṁ karohi,
anya-e0801n6:25_0: Sattiyaṁ ara hatthe ca kriyatthā eyyādayo honti. Bhavaṁ khalu rajjaṁ kareyya, bhavaṁ satto araho.
anya-e0801n6:27_0: Sambhāvane gamyamāne dhātunā vuccamāne ca eyyādayo honti vibhāsā.
anya-e0801n6:27_3: sambhāvemi saddahāmi avakappemi bhuñjeyya bhavaṁ bhuñjissati bhavaṁ abhuñji bhavaṁ,
anya-e0801n6:29_0: Mā yoge sati īādayo āādayo ca vā honti. Mā su punapi evarūpamakāsi, mā bhavaṁ agamā vanaṁ, vātveva?
anya-e0801n6:29_1: Mā te kāmaguṇe bhamassu cittaṁ, mā tvaṁ karissasi, mā tvaṁ kareyyāsi, asakakālatthoyamārambho,
anya-e0801n6:29_3: evaṁ kato kaṭo sve bhavissati, bhāvi kiccamāsīti.
anya-e0801n6:30_1: lunassu lunassutvevāyaṁ lunā-tīti tvādīnamevetaṁ majjhimapurisekavacanānamābhikkhaññe dvibbavacanaṁ,
anya-e0801n6:30_2: idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti ‘eva mesa turito aññepi niyojentoviya kiriyaṁ karotī’ti,
anya-e0801n6:30_5: tathā kālantaresupi lunāhi lunāhitvevāyaṁ aluni, alunā, lulāva, lunissatīti, evaṁ ssumhi ca yojanīyaṁ, tathā samuccayepi maṭhamaṭa, vihāramaṭetvevāyamaṭati, maṭhamaṭassu, vihāramaṭassutvevāyamaṭati,
anya-e0801n6:30_6: byāpārabhede tusāmaññavacanasseva byāpakattā anuppayogo bhavati, odanaṁ bhuñja, yāguṁ piva,
anya-e0801n6:32_0: Ekānekesu tumhāmhasaddavacanīyesu tadaññasaddavacanīyesu ca kārakesu pubbacchakkānaṁ paracchakkānaṁ majjhimuttamapaṭhamā dve dve honti yathākkamaṁ kriyatthā,
anya-e0801n6:32_1: uttamasaddo-yaṁ sabhāvato tatiyaduke ruḷho, tvaṁ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha, tvaṁ gacchase, tumhe gacchavhe, ahaṁ gacchāmi, mayaṁ gacchāma, ahaṁ gacche, mayaṁ gacchāmhe, so gacchati, te gacchanti, so gacchate, te gacchante,
anya-e0801n6:32_2: sāmatthiyā laddhattā appayujjamānesupi tumhāmhasesesu bhavanti. Gacchasi, gacchatha, gacchase, gacchavhe, gacchāmi, gacchāma, gacche, gacchāmhe, gacchati, gacchanti, gacchate, gacchante.
anya-e0801n6:34_0: Āādo īādo ssā ādo ca kriyatthassa vā aña hoti. Ñakāro-nubandho, agamā, gamā, agamī, gamī, agamissā, gamissā.
anya-e0801n6:36_0: Brūssa āho hoti aādīsu. Āha, āhu.
anya-e0801n6:38_0: Aādīsu bhūssa vuka hoti. Kakāro-nubandho, ukāro uccāraṇattho, babhūva.
anya-e0801n6:40_0: Aādīsu dvitte pubbassa bhūssa a hoti, babhūva.
anya-e0801n6:42_0: Āhādesā parassa ussa aṁsuvā hoti. Ahaṁsu, āhu.
anya-e0801n6:44_0: Āhā paresaṁ tiantīnaṁ ṭaṭū honti. Ṭakārā sabbādesatthā, āha, āhu,
anya-e0801n6:44_1: atoyeva ca ñāpakā tiantīsu ca brūssā-ho.
anya-e0801n6:46_0: Īādīsu vacassa oma hoti. Makāro-nubandho, avoca, īādoti kiṁ? Avacā.
anya-e0801n6:48_0: Advite vattamānassa dāssa daṁ vā hoti mimesu. Dammi demi, damma dema, advitteti kiṁ? Dadādhi dadāma.
anya-e0801n6:50_0: Karassa saokārassa kuṁ vā hoti mimesu. Kummi kumma, karomi karoma.
anya-e0801n6:52_0: Karassa saokārassa kā hoti vā īādīsu. Akāsi akari, akaṁsu akariṁsu, akā akarā.
anya-e0801n6:54_0: Karassa sossa hāssa ca āhaṅa vā hoti ssena saha. Kāhati karissati, akāhā akarissā, hāhati hāyissati, ahāhā ahāyissā.
anya-e0801n6:56_0: Labhādīnaṁ cchaṅa vā hoti ssenasaha. Alacchā alabhissā, lacchati labhissāti, avacchā avasissā, vacchati vasissati, acchecchā acchindissā, checchati chindissati, abhecchā abhindissā, bhecchati bhindissati, arucchā arodissā, rucchati rodissatī ,
anya-e0801n6:56_1: aññasmimpi chidassa vā cchaṅa yogavibhāgā, acchecchuṁ acchantiṁsu, aññesañca gacchaṁ gacchissaṁ.
anya-e0801n6:58_0: Bhujādīnaṁ kkhaṅa vā hoti ssena saha. Abhokkhā abhuñjissā, bhokkhati bhuñjissati, amokkhā amuñcissā, mokkhatimuñcissati, avakkhā avacissā, vakkhati vaccissati, pāvekkhā pāvisissā, pavekkhati pavisissati,
anya-e0801n6:58_1: visassā-ññasmimpi vā kkhaṅa yogavibhāgā pāvekkhi, pāvisi.
anya-e0801n6:60_0: Āādo īādo a harassa ā hoti vā. Ahā aharā, ahāsi ahari.
anya-e0801n6:62_0: Āādo īādo a gamissa ā hoti vā. Agā agamā, agā agamī.
anya-e0801n6:64_0: Ḍaṁsassa gamissa ca chaṅa vā hoti āīādīsu. Aḍañchā aḍaṁsā, aḍañchi aḍaṁsī, agañchā agacchā, agañchi agacchī.
anya-e0801n6:66_0: Hūssa heādayo honti ssatyādo. Hessati, hehissati, hohissati.
anya-e0801n6:68_0: Kṇāknāsu kriyatthassa rasso hoti. Kiṇāti, dhunāti.
anya-e0801n6:69_0: 33. Ā ī ñu mhā ssā ssamhānaṁ vā.
anya-e0801n6:70_0: Esaṁ vā rasso hoti. Gama gamā, gami gamī, gamu gamū, gamimha gamimhā, gamissa gamissā, gamissamha gamissamhā.
anya-e0801n6:72_0: Kusā ruhā ca parassa īssa chi vā hoti. Akkocchi akkosi, abhirucchi abhiruhi.
anya-e0801n6:74_0: Kriyatthā paresaṁ aādīnaṁ īādīnaṁ ssaādīnañca-byañjanassa iña hoti vibhāsā. Babhuvittha, abhavitthā, anubhavissā,
anya-e0801n6:74_1: anubhavissati anubhossati harisati hassati, etesanti kiṁ? Bhavati, byañjanassāti kiṁ? Babhūva.
anya-e0801n6:76_0: Brūto parassa tissa īña vā hoti. Bravīti, brūti.
anya-e0801n6:78_0: Kriyatthā parassa kyassa īña vā hoti. Pacīyati, paccati.
anya-e0801n6:79_0: 38. Eyyātha sse a ā īthānaṁ o, a, aṁ, ttha, ttho, vhoka.
anya-e0801n6:80_1: Tumhe bhaveyyātho bhaveyyātha, tvaṁ abhavissa abhavisse, ahaṁ abhavaṁ abhava, so abhavittha abhavā, so abhavittho, abhavī, tumhe bhavathavho bhavatha, āsahacaritova akāro gayhate,
anya-e0801n6:80_2: tho pana-nte niddesā tvādisambandhīyeva, tasseva vā nissitattā,
anya-e0801n6:82_0: Umīccassa iṁsu aṁsu vā honti. Agamiṁsu, agamaṁsu, agamuṁ.
anya-e0801n6:84_0: Eādesato oādesato ca parassa umiccassa suṁ vā hoti. Nesuṁ, nayiṁsu, assosuṁ, assuṁ,
anya-e0801n6:86_0: Hūto parassa umiccassa resuṁ vā hoti. Ahesuṁ, ahavuṁ.
anya-e0801n6:88_0: Ossa aādayo vā honti. Tvaṁ abhava, abhavi, abhavittha, abhavittho abhavo.
anya-e0801n6:90_0: Ossa si vā hoti. Ahosi tvaṁ ahuvo.
anya-e0801n6:92_0: Dīghato parassa īssa si vā hoti. Akāsi akā, adāsi adā.
anya-e0801n6:94_0: Mhātthānamhaña vā hoti. Agamhamhā agamimhā, agamuttha agamittha.
anya-e0801n6:96_0: Imiccassa siña vā toti mhātthānañca bahulaṁ. Akāsiṁ akariṁ,
anya-e0801n6:98_0: Eyyumiccassa ñaṁ vā hoti. Gacchuṁ gaccheyyuṁ.
anya-e0801n6:100_0: Ato parassa hissa lopo vā hoti. Gaccha gacchāhi, atoti kiṁ? Karohi.
anya-e0801n6:102_0: Kyassa vā lopo hoti sse. Anvabhavissā anvabhūyissā, anubhavissati anuchūyissati.
anya-e0801n6:103_0: 50. Atthiteyyādicchannaṁ sa su sa satha saṁ sāma.
anya-e0801n6:104_0: Asa=bhuviccasmā paresaṁ eyyādicchannaṁ sādayo honti yathākkamaṁ. Assa, assu, assa, assatha, assaṁ, assāma.
anya-e0801n6:106_0: Atthiteyyādicchannaṁ ādibhūtānaṁ dvinnaṁ iyā iyuṁ honti yathākkamaṁ. Siyā, siyuṁ.
anya-e0801n6:108_0: Atthito parassa takārassa tho hoti. Atthi, atthu.
anya-e0801n6:110_0: Atthissa aṭa hoti sihisu, ṭo sabbādesattho. Asi ahi.
anya-e0801n6:112_0: Atthismā paresaṁ mimānaṁ mhimhā vā honti,
anya-e0801n6:112_1: taṁsanniyogenaatthissa aṭa ca. Amhi asmi, amha asma.
anya-e0801n6:114_0: Esu mimesu atthissa sakāro hoti. Asmi asma, pararūpabādhanatthaṁ.
anya-e0801n6:116_0: Atthissa dīgho hoti īādimhi. Āsi, āsuṁ, āsi, āsittha, āsiṁ, āsiṁ mhā.
anya-e0801n6:118_0: Akārassa dīgho hoti himimesu. Pacāhi, pacāmi, pacāma, muyhāmi.
anya-e0801n6:122_0: Sakasmā kṇassakho vā hoti sse. Sakkhissā sakkuṇissā, sakkhissati, sakkuṇissati.
anya-e0801n6:124_0: Tesu īādissesu suto paresaṁ kṇokṇānaṁ roṭa vā hoti. Assosi asuṇi, assossā asuṇissā, sossati suṇissati.
anya-e0801n6:125_1: Sanāssa ñāssa nāyo vā hoti timhi. Nāyati, jānāti.
anya-e0801n6:127_0: Ñādese sanāssa ñāssa jaṁ (vā) hoti. Jaññā (jāneyya).
anya-e0801n6:129_0: Ñāto eyyāssa iyāñā honti vā. Jāniyā, jaññā jāneyya.
anya-e0801n6:131_0: Īādo ssatyādo ca ñāto knālopo vā hoti. Aññāsi ajāni, ñassati jānissati.
anya-e0801n6:133_0: Ñāto parassa ssassa hi vā hoti kamme. Paññāyihiti paññāyissati.
anya-e0801n6:135_0: Etismā parassa ssassa hi hoti vā. Ehiti essati.
anya-e0801n6:137_0: Hanā ssassa chakhā vā honti. Hañchāmi hanissāmi, paṭihaṅkhāmi paṭihanissāmi.
anya-e0801n6:139_0: Hāto parassa ssassa ha hoti vā. Hāhati jahissati.
anya-e0801n6:141_0: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa lopo vā hoti. Dakkhati dakkhissati, sakkhati sakkhissati,
anya-e0801n6:143_0: Kayirā parassa eyyumādīnaṁ eyyassa lopo hoti. Kayiruṁ, kayirāsi, kayirātha, kahirāmi, kayirāma.
anya-e0801n6:145_0: Kayirā parassa eyyassa ṭā hoti. So kayirā.
anya-e0801n6:147_0: Kayirā parassa ethassa ā hoti. Kayirātha.
anya-e0801n6:148_0: 73. Labhā iṁ īnaṁ thaṁ thā vā.
anya-e0801n6:149_0: Labhasmā iṁīiccesaṁ thaṁthā honti vā. Alatthaṁ alabhiṁ, alattha alabhi.
anya-e0801n6:151_0: Gurupubbasmā rassā paresaṁ ntentīnaṁ re vā hoti. Gacchare gacchanti, gacchare gacchante, gamissare gamissanti, gamissare gamissante, gurupubbāti kiṁ? Paca, rassati kiṁ? Honti.
anya-e0801n6:153_0: Eyyādīnaṁ ṭe vā hoti. So kare kareyya, tvaṁ kare kareyyāsi, ahaṁ kare kareyyaṁ.
anya-e0801n6:155_0: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti paracchakke visaye. Tanute.
anya-e0801n6:157_0: Ovikaraṇassa u hoti vā kvaci pubbacchakke. Vanuti vanoti.
anya-e0801n6:159_0: Eyyāmassemu vā hoti u ca. Bhavemha, bhaveyyāmu bhaveyyāma.
